Title: Asp Net complete captcha control
Description: CAPTCHA control for asp net web form applications including multi language support, reload captcha, audio captcha.
HomeWiki:
Please check the demo at Web Captcha Control Demo

ASP Net captcha control is a great solution for anyone who wants to add captcha to their asp net web form.
Net framework version 4.52

Dependency:

Client: Jquery, Bootstrap, SoundManager

Server: NAudio

(please download web demo project for all dependencies needed)


Functionalities included:
- Reload captcha without refreshing the page
- Audio captcha
- multi languages
- bootstrap enabled
- any device enabled. Tested on desktop as well as windows tablet, iPad, iPhone, android tablet

Control has been tested on all major browsers: IE 9 and up, Chrome,Firefox latest


Application is free for use by courtesy of LM Software

 This is a great extension to http://captcha.codeplex.com/

Other references for this project are:

http://getbootstrap.com/

http://naudio.codeplex.com/

http://www.schillmania.com/projects/soundmanager2/

Spelling mp3 files by the courtesy of

http://www.theblog.ca/mp3-audio-files-alphabet
